org.pathvisio.core.model

Interface PathwayListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Test

    public interface PathwayListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Implement this if you want to be notified of changes to a Pathway. This means addition of new elements to a Pathway and removal of elements from a Pathway, but not changes to properties of a single PathwayElement For example this is used by VPathway to refresh itself when a new element is added.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pathwayModified(PathwayEvent e)

      • pathwayModified
